text:
Anthony is very friendly and kind. The food here is the best. Hot and fresh. Amazing!
Edit: sink area is very dirty and is full of dirt and hair. Looks unhygienic for us to wash our hands. Please look into the cleanliness of the washing hands sink area.

Visited this outlet almost once a week. They have the nicest staff, who keep the restaurant clean and nicely decorated for different festive. Recently they added a new corner for the kiddo providing coloring materials.

This Texas Chicken has been around for  long time. Always happy to be served by their long-time staff, Anusha, who brings a smile to our faces with her warm customer service. I like it that the place is now open 24/7 and also has a small kids activity corner with free balloons to keep the kids occupied.

Best service served by Khairul. He really polite & helpful for suggest me the best menu here. The food also served hot & delicious plus the ambience here nice for dinner alone. Please give him bonus for best service üòÇüëçüèª

Visit the place here at 845pm. The service here sucks, really sucks.

The resturant supposed to operate 24hrs but however, the cleaner decided to clean the floor at the busy hr and keep chasing the customers out of the area and was asked to sit at the front area (the area was already packed with customers)

Can the management look into it. I am fine that the area to be close for cleaning after 10pm whereby customers are lesser.
